title: Device
credit_line: William Frew Memorial Purchase Prize, Given by Mr. and Mrs. Henry Oliver, Jr.
provenance_text:
Henry Mundy [b. 1919], London, England; The Hanover Gallery, London, England [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, July 1962 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 279) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by The Hanover Gallery, as the artist's agent.
[2]. The painting won the William Frew Memorial Purchase Prize at the 1961 International. It was purchased with funds provided for that purpose by Mr. and Mrs. Henry Oliver, Jr., Pittsburgh, PA. Payment to the artist was sent on October 23, 1961, though the painting was not accessioned by Carnegie Institute until the following year, on July 5, 1962.
